mapper.select: select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg, td.lic_no, td.lic_type, td.lic_renew, td.lic_verf, td.cno, td.cname, td.ccolor, td.cyear, td.cowner, td.lic_photo, td.ins_photo, td.car_photo, td.corp_photo, td.apvl from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno left outer join talat_driver td on tm.mno=td.mno order by tm.mno asc

select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg, td.lic_no, td.lic_type, td.lic_renew, td.lic_verf, td.cno, td.cname, td.ccolor, td.cyear, td.cowner, td.lic_photo, td.ins_photo, td.car_photo, td.corp_photo, td.apvl from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno left outer join talat_driver td on tm.mno=td.mno where tm.email = #{email} and tm.pwd = password(#{password})

select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg, td.lic_no, td.lic_type, td.lic_renew, td.lic_verf, td.cno, td.cname, td.ccolor, td.cyear, td.cowner, td.lic_photo, td.ins_photo, td.car_photo, td.corp_photo, td.apvl from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno left outer join talat_driver td on tm.mno=td.mno where tm.mno=#{value}
mapper.update: update talat_memb tm, talat_join tj set tm.mname=#{tm.mname}, tm.email=#{tm.email}, tm.pwd=#{tm.password}, tm.tel=#{tm.tel}, tm.birth=#{tm.birth}, tj.nic=#{tj.nicName}, tj.pst_no=#{tj.postNo}, tj.basic_addr=#{tj.basicAddress}, tj.det_addr=#{tj.detailAddress}, tj.prof=#{tj.profile}, tj.pref_gender=#{tj.preferenceGender} where tm.mno=#{value} and tj.mno=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from td, tj, tm using talat_driver td inner join talat_join tj inner join talat_memb tm on td.mno=tj.mno and tj.mno=tm.mno where td.mno=#{value}
delete from td, tj, tm using talat_driver td inner join talat_join tj inner join talat_memb tm on td.mno=tj.mno and tj.mno=tm.mno where td.mno=#{value}
